metadata.name: Étude #1 : Mt.Sinai
metadata.description:
**Machine Impressions** depict the impermanence of nature through creations undergoing a perpetual metamorphosis.

**Études** is a collection of generative, transient landscapes. Each study is a composition of four Impressions.

**Étude #1** follows the transfiguration of Mt. Sinai with the passage of the four seasons.

*The first collector will receive a gift for helping me set sail:*
**A print on canvas** stapled over a wooden frame, of an Impression of choice, by one of the best Parisian photo labs.

Impressions of Étude #1:
**1.** Printemps **2.** Été  **3.** Automne **4.** Hiver

For their **4K** versions, [visit my gallery](https://evangel.art/impressions/etudes).
